channel.title: github on Mátyás Budavári
channel.description: Recent content in github on Mátyás Budavári

item.title: Keep Your Github Contribution History
item.description: Have you ever been in a situation where you work for a few repositories over a prolonged time, and all of a sudden, you’re notified that you’ll no longer have access to these repos in a few weeks?

item.title: Deploy With Github Actions
item.description: Recently I tried Github actions to deploy some of my static sites, and I’ve been quite happy with its capabilities. Let me share my configs for different kinds of setups.
